/*package*/ class GenerationContextOp_GetOriginalCopiedInputByOutput_EditorBuilder_a extends AbstractEditorBuilder {
  @NotNull
  private SNode myNode;

  public GenerationContextOp_GetOriginalCopiedInputByOutput_EditorBuilder_a(@NotNull EditorContext context, @NotNull SNode node) {
    super(context);
    myNode = node;
  }

  @NotNull
  @Override
  public SNode getNode() {
    return myNode;
  }

  /*package*/ EditorCell createCell() {
    return createCollection_xb66g7_a();
  }

  private EditorCell createCollection_xb66g7_a() {
    EditorCell_Collection editorCell = new EditorCell_Collection(getEditorContext(), myNode, new CellLayout_Indent());
    editorCell.setCellId("Collection_xb66g7_a");
    editorCell.setBig(true);
    editorCell.setCellContext(getCellFactory().getCellContext());
    editorCell.addEditorCell(createConstant_xb66g7_a0());
    editorCell.addEditorCell(createConstant_xb66g7_b0());
    editorCell.addEditorCell(createRefNode_xb66g7_c0());
    editorCell.addEditorCell(createConstant_xb66g7_d0());
    return editorCell;
  }
  private EditorCell createConstant_xb66g7_a0() {
    EditorCell_Constant editorCell = new EditorCell_Constant(getEditorContext(), myNode, "get original copied input for");
    editorCell.setCellId("Constant_xb66g7_a0");
    Style style = new StyleImpl();
    new genContext_operationStyleClass(getEditorContext(), getNode()).apply(style, editorCell);
    editorCell.getStyle().putAll(style);
    editorCell.setDefaultText("");
    return editorCell;
  }
  private EditorCell createConstant_xb66g7_b0() {
    EditorCell_Constant editorCell = new EditorCell_Constant(getEditorContext(), myNode, "(");
    editorCell.setCellId("Constant_xb66g7_b0");
    Style style = new StyleImpl();
    new LeftParenStyleClass(getEditorContext(), getNode()).apply(style, editorCell);
    editorCell.getStyle().putAll(style);
    editorCell.setDefaultText("");
    return editorCell;
  }
  private EditorCell createRefNode_xb66g7_c0() {
    SingleRoleCellProvider provider = new GenerationContextOp_GetOriginalCopiedInputByOutput_EditorBuilder_a.outputNodeSingleRoleHandler_xb66g7_c0(myNode, MetaAdapterFactory.getContainmentLink(0xd7706f639be2479cL, 0xa3daae92af1e64d5L, 0x11e42912257L, 0x11e4292232fL, "outputNode"), getEditorContext());
    return provider.createCell();
  }
  private static class outputNodeSingleRoleHandler_xb66g7_c0 extends SingleRoleCellProvider {
    @NotNull
    private SNode myNode;

    public outputNodeSingleRoleHandler_xb66g7_c0(SNode ownerNode, SContainmentLink containmentLink, EditorContext context) {
      super(containmentLink, context);
      myNode = ownerNode;
    }

    @Override
    @NotNull
    public SNode getNode() {
      return myNode;
    }

    protected EditorCell createChildCell(SNode child) {
      EditorCell editorCell = getUpdateSession().updateChildNodeCell(child);
      editorCell.setAction(CellActionType.DELETE, new CellAction_DeleteSmart(getNode(), MetaAdapterFactory.getContainmentLink(0xd7706f639be2479cL, 0xa3daae92af1e64d5L, 0x11e42912257L, 0x11e4292232fL, "outputNode"), child));
      editorCell.setAction(CellActionType.BACKSPACE, new CellAction_DeleteSmart(getNode(), MetaAdapterFactory.getContainmentLink(0xd7706f639be2479cL, 0xa3daae92af1e64d5L, 0x11e42912257L, 0x11e4292232fL, "outputNode"), child));
      installCellInfo(child, editorCell);
      return editorCell;
    }



    private void installCellInfo(SNode child, EditorCell editorCell) {
      if (editorCell.getSubstituteInfo() == null || editorCell.getSubstituteInfo() instanceof DefaultSubstituteInfo) {
        editorCell.setSubstituteInfo(new SChildSubstituteInfo(editorCell, myNode, MetaAdapterFactory.getContainmentLink(0xd7706f639be2479cL, 0xa3daae92af1e64d5L, 0x11e42912257L, 0x11e4292232fL, "outputNode"), child));
      }
      if (editorCell.getRole() == null) {
        editorCell.setRole("outputNode");
      }
    }
    @Override
    protected EditorCell createEmptyCell() {
      getCellFactory().pushCellContext();
      getCellFactory().setNodeLocation(new SNodeLocation.FromParentAndLink(getNode(), MetaAdapterFactory.getContainmentLink(0xd7706f639be2479cL, 0xa3daae92af1e64d5L, 0x11e42912257L, 0x11e4292232fL, "outputNode")));
      try {
        EditorCell editorCell = super.createEmptyCell();
        editorCell.setCellId("empty_outputNode");
        installCellInfo(null, editorCell);
        setCellContext(editorCell);
        return editorCell;
      } finally {
        getCellFactory().popCellContext();
      }
    }
    protected String getNoTargetText() {
      return "<no input node>";
    }
  }
  private EditorCell createConstant_xb66g7_d0() {
    EditorCell_Constant editorCell = new EditorCell_Constant(getEditorContext(), myNode, ")");
    editorCell.setCellId("Constant_xb66g7_d0");
    Style style = new StyleImpl();
    new RightParenStyleClass(getEditorContext(), getNode()).apply(style, editorCell);
    editorCell.getStyle().putAll(style);
    editorCell.setDefaultText("");
    return editorCell;
  }
